long_description: The Raleigh Capri 3.0 women's road bike offers smooth Shimano 105 components and a comfortable rider position for group rides, training outings or weekend charity rides. Women-specific geometry supplies an optimum fit and ride for women, and updated frame reduces strain on wrists, elbows, neck and lower back. Hydroformed and butted aluminum frame provides a comfortable, responsive ride, resulting in excellent handling and pedaling efficiency. Carbon fork with aluminum steerer offers lightweight, vibration-damping performance. Shimano 105 drivetrain features a compact crankset and 20 wide-ranging gears for tackling hills and speeding over flats. Low-profile Shimano 105 dual-pivot caliper brakes offer dependable braking power for easy speed management. Vittoria Rubino Shack tires have a fast-rolling design for all-around road use. Specs on the Raleigh Capri 3.0 women's road bike are subject to change.
